vote.title: Authorize the first of two, one-year renewal options to the contract with The Salvation Army North Texas Area Command in the amount of $323,541.36, the Bridge Steps dba The Bridge in the amount of $214,073.66, and the Austin Street Center in the amount of $149,124.98, for emergency shelter services for the homeless for the period October 1, 2025 through September 30, 2026 – Total not to exceed $686,740.00 - Financing: FY 2025-26 Emergency Solutions Grant Fund (subject to annual appropriations)
vote.description: Authorize the first of two, one-year renewal options to the contract with The Salvation Army North Texas Area Command in the amount of $323,541.36, the Bridge Steps dba The Bridge in the amount of $214,073.66, and the Austin Street Center in the amount of $149,124.98, for emergency shelter services for the homeless for the period October 1, 2025 through September 30, 2026 – Total not to exceed $686,740.00 - Financing: FY 2025-26 Emergency Solutions Grant Fund (subject to annual appropriations)
